text:
Three boys died on the spot when a Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation (TNSTC) bus hit the two-wheeler which they were riding.

The accident occurred at Pillaichavadi near here on Sunday midnight. According to police, the victims Chandru (17) of Manaveli, Jayakannan (17) and Sikkandar (17) of Ariyankuppam were riding triples on a motorbike. When they neared Pillaichavady, a TNSTC bus proceeding from Chennai to Puducherry hit their bike.

The three sustained serious injuries and died on the spot.

A case has been registered and further investigations are on. – Staff Reporter
title: Three killed in accident
